text: 5.31 Apo 2.33-34, 3.15, Epe 1.20, Plp 2.9, Hib 2.10, 12.2 God gek tɨkjakek, nop man ne alaŋ dad amɨl, ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd okok ken lak agɨlak. Anɨb ak nopun, ne nokom nɨm Bɨawl chɨn, bɨ kasɨn gep agɨlak. Ne chɨnop Yislel binɨb mapen nɨgup ak nɨm, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgon, gach chɨnop tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨgab agɨlak.
